channel.title: JourneyChurch.tv Podcast
channel.description: Transforming a city one life at a time.

item.title: Neighbors - Sept. 1, 2013
item.itunes:author: Adam Barnett
item.description: Pastor Adam explores Luke 10 to break down the various life philosophies at work in the story of the Good Samaritan.
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Adam explores Luke 10 to break down the various life philosophies at work in the story of the Good Samaritan.

item.title: My Church is Kind of a Big Deal - Week 2
item.itunes:author: Clark Mitchell
item.description: Everyone has an innate desire to belong and Paul encourages us in Ephesians to find our belonging and home in the House of God. And we are promised in the Psalms that if we plant ourselves in the courts of our God, we will flourish!
item.itunes:summary: Everyone has an innate desire to belong and Paul encourages us in Ephesians to find our belonging and home in the House of God. And we are promised in the Psalms that if we plant ourselves in the courts of our God, we will flourish!

item.title: My Church is Kind of a Big Deal - Week 1
item.itunes:author: Clark Mitchell
item.description: Each and every one of us has a story and that story can be shaped by many things. Pastor Clark unpacks three biblical stories of how people encountered Christ and how their stories changed forever.
item.itunes:summary: Each and every one of us has a story and that story can be shaped by many things. Pastor Clark unpacks three biblical stories of how people encountered Christ and how their stories changed forever.

item.title: Face to Face - Week 2
item.itunes:author: Clark Mitchell
item.description: We are called to love our neighbors as ourselves, but how can you effectively do that if you don't first love yourself? Pastor Clark unpacks this simple truth and how we are called to find our worth in what Christ did on the cross.
item.itunes:summary: We are called to love our neighbors as ourselves, but how can you effectively do that if you don't first love yourself? Pastor Clark unpacks this simple truth and how we are called to find our worth in what Christ did on the cross.

item.title: Face to Face - Week 1
item.itunes:author: Clark Mitchell
item.description: Pastor Clark kicks off a great series, Face to Face by telling the story of the sick woman in Mark 5 and how it shows us that all it takes is Just One Touch!
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Clark kicks off a great series, Face to Face by telling the story of the sick woman in Mark 5 and how it shows us that all it takes is Just One Touch!

item.title: Heroes - Week 6
item.itunes:author: Mac Richard
item.description: Pastor Mac Richard concludes our Heroes series with an amazing message about Gideon and the battles we all fight in our own lives!
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Mac Richard concludes our Heroes series with an amazing message about Gideon and the battles we all fight in our own lives!

item.title: Heroes - Week 5
item.itunes:author: Rod Conant
item.description: Pastor Rod continues our Heroes series with the story of Abraham and how God Always Does the Right Thing!
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Rod continues our Heroes series with the story of Abraham and how God Always Does the Right Thing!

item.title: Heroes - Week 4
item.itunes:author: Ray Johnston
item.description: Pastor Ray Johnston, Senior Pastor at Bayside Church in California, joined us for the 4th week of our Heroes series. Pastor Ray brought an amazing message about Hope and the story of Nehemiah!
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Ray Johnston, Senior Pastor at Bayside Church in California, joined us for the 4th week of our Heroes series. Pastor Ray brought an amazing message about Hope and the story of Nehemiah!

item.title: Heroes - Week 3
item.itunes:author: David Smith
item.description: Pastor David Smith, Executive Senior Pastor at Gateway Church, joined us for our third week talking about our biblical heroes. He gave a great message about John the Baptist and the call on his life.
item.itunes:summary: Pastor David Smith, Executive Senior Pastor at Gateway Church, joined us for our third week talking about our biblical heroes. He gave a great message about John the Baptist and the call on his life.

item.title: Heroes - Week 2
item.itunes:author: Bryan Waldenville
item.description: Pastor Bryan Waldenville continues our Heroes series with a word about Noah and how we are called to be difference makers.
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Bryan Waldenville continues our Heroes series with a word about Noah and how we are called to be difference makers.

item.title: Heroes - Week 1
item.itunes:author: Adam Barnett
item.description: Pastor Adam Barnett kicks off our new series, Heroes, with a great message about the biblical hero Elijah!
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Adam Barnett kicks off our new series, Heroes, with a great message about the biblical hero Elijah!

item.title: Joseph - Week 3
item.itunes:author: Clark Mitchell
item.description: Pastor Clark shares a great word about creating environments where people experience the Presence of God & His Power transforms their life.
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Clark shares a great word about creating environments where people experience the Presence of God & His Power transforms their life.

item.title: Joseph - Week 2
item.itunes:author: Clark Mitchell
item.description: Pastor Clark brings a great message from the life of Joseph about Where Greatness Begins!
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Clark brings a great message from the life of Joseph about Where Greatness Begins!

item.title: Joseph - Week 2
item.itunes:author: Rod Conant
item.description: Pastor Rod brought a great message Sunday kicking off our new series, Joseph! Don't Give Up!
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Rod brought a great message Sunday kicking off our new series, Joseph! Don't Give Up!

item.title: I Heart This City - Week 4
item.itunes:author: Clark Mitchell
item.description: In the last week of our series, I Heart This City, Pastor Clark brings a message of hope and vision of God's plan to rebuild the city!
item.itunes:summary: In the last week of our series, I Heart This City, Pastor Clark brings a message of hope and vision of God's plan to rebuild the city!

item.title: I Heart This City - Week 3
item.itunes:author: Clark Mitchell
item.description: Pastor Clark talks about how the God's plan is worth the wait and not confusing the rewards of success with success itself.
item.itunes:summary: Pastor Clark talks about how the God's plan is worth the wait and not confusing the rewards of success with success itself.
